name: Thalamus (itch)
description:
Treat your eyes, tickle your brain: Thalamus is an experimental audiovisual experience for you to run around in and explore.

Between armillary sphere drones and confetti hail dizziness, diving with jellyfish and watching psychedelic trees grow - discover the spaces conjured by these fresh tip-toers of aesthetics:

Daniel Røskaft   -   Gereon Plättner   -   Martina Marchio

This game was made for the Game-A-Week course at UE Berlin lead by Prof. Csongor Baranyai. The theme for this week was: "Toys & Playfulness"
